description.value:
Basic Attack

At-Will ✦ Fire

Standard

Reach 3

+29 vs AC; 2d10+9 plus 4d6 fire damage.

Basic Attack

At-Will

Standard

Reach 3

+29 vs AC; 2d10+9 damage.

At-Will

Standard

The dragon makes two claw attacks.

At-Will

Immediate Reaction

Trigger: When an enemy moves to a position where it flanks the red dragon, at-will

The dragon attacks the target; reach 3; targets the triggering enemy; +27 vs Reflex; 3d10+9 damage, and the target is pushed 2 squares.

Recharge 5-6 ✦ Fire

Standard

Ranged 20

+27 vs Reflex; 3d10+8 fire damage, and ongoing 10 fire damage (save ends).

Recharge 5-6 ✦ Fire

Standard

Close blast 5

+27 vs Reflex; 3d12+8 fire damage. Miss: Half damage.

Encounter ✦ Fire

Free

Trigger: When first bloodied, encounter

The dragon's breath weapon recharges, and the dragon uses it immediately.

Encounter ✦ Fire

Standard

Close burst 10

Targets enemies; +25 vs Will; the target is stunned until the end of the dragon's next turn. Aftereffect: The target takes a -2 penalty to attack rolls (save ends.
